characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with subtle rosy undertones, more pronounced on cheeks and around the nose, appears slightly paler under the eyes
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright sky blue with a darker limbal ring and a hint of grey near the pupils
characterDescription.eyeShape: large, slightly almond-shaped eyes with visible upper eyelids and well-defined eyelashes, a small crease above the lid
characterDescription.hairColor: dark chestnut brown with natural subtle highlights of auburn, appearing lighter at the ends
characterDescription.hairTexture: slightly wavy with loose curls, fine strands, medium density, tends to frizz slightly
characterDescription.hairStyle: styled in two high buns on either side of the head, secured with pink hair clips featuring white pom-poms, with loose strands framing the face
characterDescription.faceShape: oval face with full cheeks, soft jawline, and a gently sloping forehead
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip and barely visible nostrils
characterDescription.lips: naturally pink lips, slightly fuller bottom lip than top lip, well-defined cupid's bow
characterDescription.smile: a slight, contemplative frown, not a full smile, but the lips are relaxed and even
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick eyebrows, dark brown, slightly arched, and well-groomed
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears close to the head, with visible lobes
characterDescription.cheeks: full round cheeks with a natural rosy blush, giving a youthful appearance
characterDescription.chin: rounded soft chin, blending smoothly into the jawline
characterDescription.facialProportions: large eyes relative to face size, nose takes up about 1/4 of the face length, overall balanced proportions
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: slight shadow under the eyes, no visible moles or freckles, but fine vellus hairs are visible on the face in the right lighting
characterDescription.overallImpression: a sweet and somewhat serious appearance, baby-faced features, giving the impression of thoughtfulness
characterDescription.fullDescription: This child appears to be around 6-7 years old, with fair skin and rosy undertones that accent her full cheeks. She has bright sky blue eyes with a darker limbal ring, framed by dark chestnut brown hair styled in two high buns with pink pom-pom clips. Her face is oval-shaped with a small, slightly upturned nose and naturally pink lips, the bottom slightly fuller. Her medium-thick, dark brown eyebrows are slightly arched, and she has a rounded soft chin completing her sweet, thoughtful appearance.
